Title: Provides for the labeling of all shipments of firearms, and certain shipments of shotguns and rifles and reporting certain information
Summary: Provides for the labeling of all shipments of firearms, and shipments of shotguns and rifles in jurisdictions which require a permit or license to possess a rifle or shotgun; provides for manifests for transportation thereof, notice to the superintendent of state police, transporters to know what they are transporting when reasonably possible, and for postponement of delivery pending police investigation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to labeling of certain shipments of firearms, rifles and shotguns and reporting certain information
